title: One Season of Sunshine
description: Adopted as an infant, Jane Aaron longs to know the identity of her birth mother and why she gave her up. So she's come to Cedar Springs, the small Texas town where she was born, for answers. Handsome ad executive Asher Price recently lost his wife in a terrible car crash. When he hires Jane as nanny for his two children, sparks fly. As Jane falls in love with Asher and his children, secrets emerge that may be more than anyone can bear.
author: Julia London
